snippet: AMES--Steven. Steven was an extraordinary husband, father, grandfather and friend. His loss will leave a void in our lives that will never be filled. Steven faced every struggle with strength and grace - and will be missed by all who knew him. Our hearts are broken for his beloved Ann, sons David and Adam, and the entire family. Joel and Maura Surnamer 1/3
